          <tr>
            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>1</strong>.  It Is By No Means An Uncommon Spectacle To Find A Man Applying Himself To Work With The Utmost Assiduity, In Order That His Wife May In Due Form Render For Him That Degree Of Vicarious Leisure Which The Common Sense Of The Time Demands.</td>
            <td style="text-align: center">
              <audio style="width: 100px;" controls="" preload="none" src="./audio/eng_dan/3570_5695_000001_000007.gt.flac"></audio>

          <tr>
            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>2</strong>.  "Phronsie," Said Jasper Quickly, "What Do You Suppose Prince Said The Other Day?"</td>

            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>4</strong>.  It Has Been Said Before, But You May Feel That It Is Quite Time It Was Said Again; Besides, For All The Audience Knows, Lord John May Simply Be Quoting.</td>

            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>7</strong>.  And A Prettier Cap You Never Could See, For Mother Herself Had Knitted It, And Nobody Could Make Anything Quite As Nice As Mother Could.</td>

            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>19</strong>.  Among The Country Population Its Place Is To Some Extent Taken By Savings And Home Comforts Known Through The Medium Of Neighborhood Gossip Sufficiently To Serve The Like General Purpose Of Pecuniary Repute.</td>

          <tr>
            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>20</strong>.  Frank Was Always Reading About The Doings Of Rich People And Feeling Outraged. He Had An Inexhaustible Stock Of Stories About Their Crimes And Follies, How They Bribed The Courts And Shot Down Their Butlers With Impunity Whenever They Chose.</td>
            <td style="text-align: center">

            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>26</strong>.  He Hated Everything Like Slavery, And As Young As He Was, He Had Already Made Five Attempts To Escape.</td>

            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>28</strong>.  The Mistress Professed To Know Nothing About It, Simply Said, 'She Went To Sleep And Fell Out Herself.' As Usual Nothing Was Done In The Way Of Punishment."</td>

            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>29</strong>.  Then, Turning To Jane, She Asked, In A Somewhat Altered Tone, "Has She Been A Good Girl, Jane?"</td>

            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>30</strong>.  I Get Tired Of Seeing Men And Horses Going Up And Down, Up And Down."</td>

          <tr>
            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>31</strong>.  "Yes, We Are... Certainly... ," I Replied Evasively, "But After We Make A Detour."</td>
            <td style="text-align: center">
              <audio style="width: 100px;" controls="" preload="none" src="./audio/eng_dan/8463_294828_000038_000000.gt.flac"></audio>

            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td style="text-align: left"><strong>32</strong>.  The Abraham Lincoln Had Been Perfectly Chosen And Fitted Out For Its New Assignment.</td>
            <td style="text-align: center">
